Check if any of the following items are on sale at Walmart: ribeye steak, fresh oranges, or toilet paper. If any are on sale, add a note in Notes with their prices.

---

### Available Shortcuts from Past Experience ###
We additionally provide some shortcut functionalities based on past experience. These shortcuts are predefined sequences of operations that might make the plan more efficient. Each shortcut includes a precondition specifying when it is suitable for use. If your plan implies the use of certain shortcuts, ensure that the precondition is fulfilled before using them. To check if ribeye steak, fresh oranges, or toilet paper are on sale at Walmart, I can use the Walmart app on the phone. If any of these items are on sale, I will note their prices in the Notes app. The process involves searching for each item in the Walmart app and checking their prices. If any are on sale, I will record the details in the Notes app.

### Plan ###

2. Search for "ribeye steak" and check if it is on sale. Note the price if applicable.
3. Search for "fresh oranges" and check if they are on sale. Note the price if applicable.
4. Search for "toilet paper" and check if it is on sale. Note the price if applicable.
5. Open the Notes app and record the sale prices of the items found.

### Current Subgoal ###
Open the Walmart app.

#### Atomic Actions ####
The atomic action functions are listed in the format of `name(arguments): description` as follows:
- Open_App(app_name): If the current screen is Home or App screen, you can use this action to open the app named "app_name" on the visible on the current screen.
- Tap(x, y): Tap the position (x, y) in current screen.
- Swipe(x1, y1, x2, y2): Swipe from position (x1, y1) to position (x2, y2). To swipe up or down to review more content, you can adjust the y-coordinate offset based on the desired scroll distance. For example, setting x1 = x2 = 540, y1 = 1170, and y2 = 234 will swipe upwards to review additional content below. To swipe left or right in the App switcher screen to choose between open apps, set the x-coordinate offset to at least 540.
- Enter(): Press the Enter key after typing (useful for searching).
- Switch_App(): Show the App switcher for switching between opened apps.
- Back(): Return to the previous state.
- Home(): Return to home page.
- Wait(): Wait for 10 seconds to give more time for a page loading.
